mapper.select: /* 팝업 조건 리스트 보기 popSelectList */ select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by ${sort_idx} ${sort_dir}) as idx ,a.ss_seq ,a.ss_fdate ,a.ss_tdate ,a.ss_fhour ,a.ss_thour ,a.ss_fminute ,a.ss_tminute ,a.ss_ftime ,a.ss_ttime ,a.event_code ,b.event_name ,b.event_status from tbl_search_setup a WITH(NOLOCK) left join tbl_eval_event b WITH(NOLOCK) on a.event_code=b.event_code where a.event_code = #{event_code} order by ${sort_idx} ${sort_dir}
